text: The flag of Nauru was created in 1968. == Appearance == The flag of Nauru is a dark blue field with the thin yellow horizontal stripe across in the center and a large white twelve-pointed star on the bottom of the stripe and near the hoist-side. The blue background represents the ocean surrounding Nauru, the yellow line is symbolic of the equator, and the white 12-pointed star symbolizes the 12 tribes of the people of Nauru. It began its use on January 31, 1968, after the independence and creation of the country of Nauru. == References == Nauru Category:Nauru
title: Flag of Nauru
